Name: Small person
About the game: You are a clerk to the king. With his mind and luck earned such a high position at an early age, thus respect. The king is sick and because of this can not exercise the government. He appoints a receiver, but few agree with this. Announced illegitimate son of the king, who accumulates strength to qualify for the throne. Well, especially in such a difficult time for the country, we should not forget about neighboring countries, which are eager to tear away a tidbit of land. Noble and honorable people always revolve around you, despite this, it is you who will become the proponent for this or that side of the confrontation. Features The freedom of action. Open location and you are free to conduct a dialogue with any of the characters, go wherever you want and take any side of the conflict. Except that you will not be indifferent. Several endings. Not taking into account the fact that you can be imprisoned or killed, there are two endings in the game, each of which has two branches. Your main tool for achieving the goal is dialogue. But sometimes you can not do without a coin and violence. But the latter will not be carried out by your own hands. And for your tip-off.
